data.title: Eric Hoffer Book Award Category Finalists
data.meta_description: independent book award for the small press, academic press & independent press, including self-published books
data.text:
Eric Hoffer Book Award Gold Seal © The Eric Hoffer Project

After our rigorous first round of judging, less than 10% of the nominees become category finalists. We consider this a distinction of its own merit and, in 2008, began officially announcing these titles. Finalists are selected by category scoring and considered for honors. There are typically 1-6 books per category remaining as finalists that nearly rose to category honors. Below are the current and previous category finalists in alphabetical order by book. We do not list their specific categories. This is a general list of books that reached the top judges, yet were not given specific category honors. They are the Eric Hoffer Book Award Category Finalists. (Please click here to view the Montaigne Medal Finalists, da Vinci Eye Finalists, First Horizon Award Finalists, or Medal Provocateur Finalists.)
